definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prob. be firm, only in der. conj. (NH Aram. [[כּוּן]], in der. conj., [[כִּיוֵּן]] arrange, direct; kawen put right, correct; As. kânu, be firm, right Dl:HWB 321; Ar. ka0na (med. w) exist, occur, be; so Eth. kona: Sab. [[כון]] DHM:ZMG 1875, 599, Ph. [[כון]] be (oft.));—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. (on 3 ms. v. Pt. infr.), 3 fs. [[נׇכּ֫וֹנׇה]] 1Ki 2:46; 3 pl. [[נׇכ֫וֹנוּ]] Pr 19:29; [[נׇכּׂ֫ננוּ]] Ez Eze 16:7; Impf. [[יִכּוֹן]] Pr 12:3 +; 3 fs. [[תִּכּוֹן]] Je 30:20 +; [[וַתִּכּׂן]] 1Ki 2:12, 2Ch 8:16, etc.; Imv. [[הִכּוֹן]] Am 4:12; [[הִכּׂן]] Ez Eze 38:7; pl. [[הכונוּ]] 2Ch 35:4 Kt (Qr [[הָכִינוּ]] Hiph.); Pt. [[נׇכוֹן]] Ge 41:32 + (in Ps 93:2 and perh. elsewh. the Pf. would be poss.); cstr. [[נְכוֹן]] Pr 4:18; f. [[נְכוֹנׇה]] Ps 5:10 + 2 t.; pl. [[נְכׂנִים]] Ex 19:11 + 2 t.; pass. or neut., and (less oft.) reflex.:—
be set up, established, fixed:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., of house upon ([[עַל]]) pillars Ju Jdg 16:26, Jdg 16:29, so, in metaph., of temple-mt., sq. [[בְּראׁשׁ]] Is 2:2 = Mic 4:1; be firm, of breasts at puberty Ez Eze 16:7; firmly established, of [[תֵּבֵל]] Ps 93:1 = Ps 96:10 = 1Ch 16:30; firm, i.e. a strong support, of ´[[י]]'s hand [[יׇ דִי תִּכּוֹן עִמּוֹ]] Ps 89:22 (‖[[זְרוֹעִי תְאַמְּחֶנּוּ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., of throne 2Sa 7:16 = 1Ch 17:14, 1Ki 2:45, Ps 89:38, Ps 93:2, Pr 16:12, Pr 25:5, Pr 29:14; of king, royal family, kingdom 1Sa 20:31, 1Ki 2:12, 1Ki 2:46, 2Sa 7:26 = 1Ch 17:24.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of any persons, be established, stable, secure, enduring Job 21:8 (c. [[לִפְנֵי]]), Pr 12:3, also v:Pr 12:19 (subj. [[שְׂפַת אֱמֶת]]) Ps 101:7 (c. [[לְנֶגֶד עֵינׇ֑י]]), Ps 102:28 (c. [[לְפָנֶיְ]]), Ps 140:12 (c. [[בָּאָרֶץ]]); of plans Pr 16:3, Pr 20:18; [[נְכוֹן הַיּוֹם]] Pr 4:18 the established, stable, (part) of the day, i.e. mid-day, when the sun seems motionless in mid-heaven.—2Sa 6:6 v. [[נׇכוֹן]] n.pr. infr.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: fixed, securely determined [[הַדָּבָר מֵעִם]] ´[[נ]] [[הָאֱלֽהִים]] (‖[[אֱמֶת]]) Ge 41:32 (E); so [[כְּשַׁחַר נׇכוֹן מׂחָאוֹ]] Ho 6:3 MT, but rd. [[כְּשַׁחֲרֵנוּ כֵּן נִמְחָאֵהוּ]] Gie:Beiträge 208 We:ad loc.; substantiated, certain, of an allegation De 13:15 = De 17:4; [[עַל־נׇכוֹן]] acc. to (what is) certain, = certainly, assuredly 1Sa 23:23, 1Sa 26:4 (v. Dr).
in moral sense, be directed aright, of ways Pr 4:26, Ps 119:5 (cf. Hiph.

); be fixed aright, stedfast [[נׇכוֹן]] [[לִבִּי]] Ps 57:8, Ps 57:8, Ps 108:2, so Ps 112:7; [[לִבָּם לאׁ נׇכוֹן עִמּוֹ]] Ps 78:37; [[רוּחַ נׇכוֹן]] Ps 51:12 (‖[[לֵב טָהוֹר]]); [[לא נׇכוֹן לעשׂות כן]] Ex 8:22 (J) it is not right, proper, etc.; pt. f. [[נְכוֹנׇה]] as subst. = what is right, the right Job 42:7, Job 42:8; = uprightness Ps 5:10.

prepare, be ready, pers. Am 4:12 (c. [[ל]] inf.); words Pr 22:18; [[הִכּׂן וְהָכֵן לְְ]] Ez Eze 38:7; 2Ch 35:4 Kt (Qr Hiph.); pt. as adj. = prepared, ready, oft. c. [[הָוׇה]], of persons Ex 19:11, Ex 19:15, Ex 34:2, Jos 8:4 (all JE); of things, sq. [[ל]] pers. Job 12:5, Ne 8:10, [[ל]] loc. Job 18:12, [[ל]] nom. act. Ps 38:18; [[ב]] loc. Job 15:23;

pass. be prepared, of judgments Pr 19:29 ([[ל]] pers.); of work be arranged, settled 2Ch 8:16; fig. of prayer Ps 141:2 be arranged, set in order, as incense before thee (> present itself as incense); be arranged, ordered, of temple service 2Ch 29:35, 2Ch 35:10, 2Ch 35:16.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֵכִין]] Jos 4:4 +; sf. [[הֱכִינַנִי]] 1Ki 2:24; [[הֱכִינוֹ]] 2Sa 5:12, 1Ch 14:2; [[הֱכִינׇהּ]] Job 28:27; 2 ms. [[הֲכִינוֹתָ]] Job 11:13 +; 3 pl. [[הֵכִינוּ]] 1Ch 12:39 +; [[וְהֵכִינוּ]] consec. Ex 16:5; 1 pl. [[הֲכִינוֹנוּ]] 1Ch 29:16; [[הֵכַנּוּ]] (Ges:§ 72, R. 6) 2Ch 29:16, etc.; Impf. [[יׇכִין]] Ju Jdg 12:6 +; [[וַיׇּ֫כֶן]] 1Ch 15:1 + 3 t., etc.; Imv. [[הָכֵן]] Ge 43:16 +; pl. [[הָכִינוּ]] Jos 1:11 +; Inf. abs. [[הָכֵן]] Jos 3:17, so [[הָכִין]] Jos 4:3 (rd. [[הָכֵין]], v. Di), Je 10:23 (v. Gie), Ez Eze 7:14 (v. Sm Co and infr.; see on all Kön:i. 468); cstr. [[הָכִין]] Is 9:6 +; sf. [[הֲכִינוֹ]] Na 2:4, Pr 8:27; [[הֲכִינׇהּ]] Je 33:2; Pt. [[מֵכִין]] Je 10:12 + 4 t.;—(favourite word in Ch., in various applications)
establish, set up:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: king (or, one as king) 2Sa 5:12, 1Ki 2:24, 1Ch 14:2, royal seed Ps 89:5, kingdom 1Sa 13:13, 2Sa 7:12 = 1Ch 17:11, 1Ch 28:7, 2Ch 12:1, 2Ch 17:5, throne 1Ch 22:10; the world [[תֵּבֵל]] Je 10:12 = Je 51:15; mts. Ps 65:7; heavens Pr 8:27; an altar upon ([[עַל]]) its base Ezr 3:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: God's faithfulness Ps 89:3; heart of humble Ps 10:17.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = accomplish, do Je 33:2 (‖[[עשׂה]]), = make Is 40:20, Job 28:27.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: make firm, only inf. abs., as adv. = firmly [[הָכֵן]] Jos 3:17; [[הָכִין]] Jos 4:3 (v. supr.)

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: fix, so as to be ready, make ready, prepare, a gift Ge 43:25 (J), place Ex 23:20 (JE), 2Ch 3:1; c. [[לְ]] rei 1Ch 15:1, 1Ch 15:3, also (obj. om.) v:1Ch 15:12 (vid. Be, and Da:Synt. § 144), 2Ch 1:4 ([[בַּהֵכִין]], v. Ges:§ 138. 3. b); oft. prepare food, acc. + [[לְ]] pers. Jos 1:11 (D), Ps 78:20; [[לְ]] om. Pr 6:8, Pr 30:25; obj. om. 1Ch 12:39, 2Ch 35:14, 2Ch 35:14, 2Ch 35:15; both om. Ge 43:16 (J), 1Ch 9:32; prepare a road De 19:3, a sacrifice Zep 1:7, ambuscades Je 51:12, one's work Pr 24:27, materials for ([[לְ]]) temple 1Ch 22:3, 1Ch 22:14, also v:1Ch 22:14 (no [[לְ]]), 1Ch 29:2, 1Ch 29:3; weapons (c. [[לְ]] pers.) 2Ch 26:14 and (hostile purpose) Ps 7:14, cf. Ps 57:7, Is 14:21 prepare slaughter-place for ([[לְ]]) his children; store-rooms 2Ch 31:11 a, also v:2Ch 31:11 b (obj. om.); gallows (c. [[לְ]] pers.) Es 6:4, Es 7:10; corn (produce of land) Ps 65:10; land v:Ps 65:10, so (= restore) Ps 68:11; c. acc. pers. 2Ch 35:6; fig. of belly preparing deceit Job 15:35; make preparation (for, [[לְ]] rei) 1Ch 22:5, and v:1Ch 22:5 ([[לְ]] om.); sq. [[לִבְנוֹת]] 1Ch 28:2, c. acc. material + [[לִבְנוֹת]] 1Ki 5:32, 1Ch 29:16; without [[לְ]], make ready 1Sa 23:22, Na 2:4; Ez Eze 7:14 (rd. [[הָכִינוּ הָכֵן]] Co, for [[הַכּׂל]] ´[[ה]] MT) = make full preparation! make thee ready! Je 46:14 ([[לְ]] dat. eth.), Ez Eze 28:7 (id.), 2Ch 35:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: provide for, provide, furnish Nu 23:1, Nu 23:29, Nu 29:7, Jos 4:4 (all JE), Job 27:16, Job 27:17, food for ([[לְ]]) raven Job 39:41, rain for ([[לְ]]) earth Ps 147:8; 1Ch 29:19, 2Ch 2:6, Ps 74:16.

direct one's face towards ([[אֶל־]]) Ez Eze 4:3, Eze 4:7; in moral and spiritual sense, direct one's step ([[חַעֲדוֹ]]) = order aright, Je 10:23 (v. supr.), Pr 16:9, so ([[פְּעָמַי]]) Ps 119:133; [[אֱלֽהָיו]] ´[[הֵכִין דְּרָכָיו לִפְנֵי י]] 2Ch 27:6, also (sq. [[דרכיו]] only) Pr 21:29 Kt (Qr [[יׇבִין]]); [[עַל הַהֵכִין הָאֱלֽהִים לָעָם]] 2Ch 29:36 that which God had ordered aright for the people (on art. = pron. rel. v. Ges:§ 138. 3. b); sq. [[לֵב]] Job 11:13, Ps 78:8; + [[לְ]], ´[[לאׁ הֵכִין לִבּוֹ לִדְרוֹשׁ אֶת־י]] 2Ch 12:14, so 2Ch 19:3, 2Ch 30:19; + ´[[לִדְרוֹשׁ אֵתאתּוֹרַת י]] Ezr 7:10; [[הכין לבב]] ´[[אֶל־]] 1Sa 7:3 direct the heart towards ´[[י]], 1Ch 29:18 (´[[י]] subj.), so (c. [[לֵאלֽהִים]]) 2Ch 20:33; hence (no obj. expr.) = give attention, sq. inf. Ju Jdg 12:6.
arrange, order 2Ch 29:19 (of sacred vessels; + [[הִקְדַּשְׁנוּ]]), 2Ch 35:20 (of temple).
be established, of throne Is 16:5; be fastened, of hooks Ez Eze 40:43.
be prepared for ([[לְ]] pers.) Is 30:33 and ([[לְ]] temp.) Pr 21:31; abs. Na 2:6; be ready Zec 5:11.

definitions.title: Po‘lēl.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[כּוֹנֵן]] Ps 9:8 + 3 t., [[וְכוֹנֵן]] consec. Hb Hab 2:12; sf. [[כּוֹנְַנׇהּ]] Is 45:18; 2 ms. [[כּוֹנַנְתָּ]] Ps 99:4, Ps 119:90, [[כּוֹנׇ֑נְתָּה]] Ps 8:4, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְכוֹנֵן]] Is 62:7; sf. [[וַיְכׂנְַנְֶ֑]] De 32:6, [[יְכוֹנְַנֶהָ]] Ps 24:2 +, sf. 1 pl. [[וַיְכֻנֶנּוּ]] Job 31:15 ([[וַיְכוּנֶּנוּ]] van d. H); 2 ms. [[תְּכוֹנֵן]] Ps 7:10, Ps 21:13, etc.; Imv. [[כּוֹנֵן]] Job 8:8 (but on text v. infra), [[כּוֹנְַנׇה]] Ps 90:17, sf. [[כּוֹנְַנֵהוּ]] Ps 90:17; —orig. make firm;—
set up, establish:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, found, a city Hb Hab 2:12 (‖[[בנה]]), Ps 107:36.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, establish, king's throne 2Sa 7:13 = 1Ch 17:12, his own throne Ps 9:8 ([[לְמִשְׁפָּט]]), sanctuary Ex 15:7 (song), a nation De 32:6 (poem; ‖[[קנה]], [[עשׂה]]), a city Ps 48:9, Ps 87:5, [[תֵּבֵל]] Ps 24:2 (c. [[עַל]], ‖[[יׇסַד]]), [[אֶרֶץ]] Ps 119:90, cf. Is 45:18, also Ps 68:10 (obj. om., rd. perh. [[אֶרֶץ חִיׇּה]] Bi Che), heavens Pr 3:19 (‖[[יׇסַד־אָָרֶץ]]), moon and stars Ps 8:4; fig., steps of men Ps 40:3, work of men's hands Ps 90:17, Ps 90:17, justice Ps 99:4; establish, i.e. vindicate and make secure to righteous ([[חַדִּיק]]) Ps 7:10.

constitute, make, a man (in womb) Job 31:15 (‖[[עשׂה]]), cf. Ps 119:73 (‖ id.); c. acc. + [[לְ]] rei + [[לְ]] pers. reflex. 2Sa 7:24 thou hast made for thyself ([[לְְ]]), thy people ([[אֶת־עַמְְּ]]) Israel for thyself ([[לְְ]]) into a people ([[לְעָם]]) for ever.

fix, so as to be ready, arrow upon ([[עַל]]) string Ps 11:2, so ([[חֵץ]] om.) Ps 21:13 (c. [[עַל־פְּנֵיהֶם]]), and poss. ([[חֵץ]] om.) Is 51:13 (Di Che al.; but dub., cf. Du; verse corrupt acc. to Che:Intr. Is 427), a bow Ps 7:13.
direct (sc. [[לֵב]]), sq. [[לְחֵקֶר]] Job 8:8, i.e. give attention to (but no ‖ in Po‘l.; rd. perh. [[בּוֹנֵן]], cf. De 32:10, v. Ol Di).

definitions.title: Po‘lal.
definitions.body: Pf. be established: ´[[מי]] [[מִחְעֲדֵי־גֶבֶר כּוֹנׇ֑נוּ]] Ps 37:23 from ´[[י]] are a man's steps established; = be prepared [[כּוֹנׇנ֑וּ]] Ez Eze 28:13 but del. Co Da after A B SyrVer al.

definitions.title: Hithpo‘l.
definitions.body: Impf.; be established, of house, 3 ms. [[יִתְכּוֹנׇ֑ן]] Pr 24:3 (‖[[יִבָּנֶה]]), of nation, 2 fs. [[תִּכּוֹנׇ֑נִי]] (Ges:§ 54. 2. b) Is 54:14; 3 fs. [[תִּכּוֹנֵן]] = be restored, of city Nu 21:27 (JE; ‖[[תִּבָּנֶה]]); set oneself, take one's stand 3 mpl. [[יִכּוֹנׇ֑נוּ]] Ps 59:5.
